The [93mdata[0m are [93mpresented[0m in [93mfrequency[0m [93mdistribution[0m [93mtables[0m. [93mSixty[0m-[93msix[0m [93marticles[0m were [93mpublished[0m in the [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m [93mperiod[0m, whose [93mthemes[0m were [93mFood[0m [93mConsumption[0m ([93m33[0m.[93m3[0m%), [93mF[0m&[93mN[0m [93mPolicies[0m and [93mPrograms[0m ([93m24[0m.[93m2[0m%), [93mNutritional[0m [93mStatus[0m [93mAssessment[0m ([93m22[0m.[93m7[0m%), [93mEnvironment[0m and [93mFood[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93m13[0m.[93m6[0m%), [93mFood[0m [93mTechnology[0m and [93mLabeling[0m ([93m3[0m.[93m0[0m%), [93mComplementary[0m [94mFeeding[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m5[0m%) and [93mFood[0m and [93mNutrition[0m [93mEducation[0m ([93m1[0m.[93m5[0m%). [93mComparing[0m the [93mpercentage[0m [93mdistribution[0m of [93mtopics[0m with the [93mreview[0m of [93mC[0m&[93mSC[0m [93mpublications[0m between [93m1996[0m and [93m2019[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mobserved[0m an [93mincrease[0m in [93mstudies[0m on [93mFood[0m [93mConsumption[0m, A&[93mN[0m [93mPolicies[0m and [93mPrograms[0m, a [93mdecrease[0m in [93marticles[0m on [93mNutritional[0m [93mStatus[0m [93mAssessment[0m, [93mComplementary[0m [94mFeeding[0m, and [93mFood[0m and [93mNutrition[0m [93mEducation[0m, and a [93mlack[0m of [93mstudies[0m on [93mBreastfeeding[0m. [93mNew[0m [93mareas[0m of [93minterest[0m [93memerged[0m, [93msuch[0m as [93mFood[0m [93mEnvironment[0m and [93mFood[0m [93mTechnology[0m and [93mLabeling[0m.

[93mage[0m-[93mstandardized[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mrates[0m [93madjusted[0m to the [93mWorld[0m [93mStandard[0m [93mPopulation[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m [93m30[0m.[93m7[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m29[0m.[93m2[0m-[93m32[0m.[93m2[0m) of [93mtheir[0m [93mlifespan[0m in [93m2000[0m, and [93m24[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% To [93maddress[0m this [93mchallenge[0m, [93mefficient[0m [93myet[0m [93mphysically[0m [93mgrounded[0m [92mmodels[0m are [93mneeded[0m-[93mones[0m that not only [93menable[0m [93maccurate[0m [93mpredictions[0m but [93malso[0m [93mprovide[0m [93minsight[0m into how [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m [93mscale[0m in [93mcomplex[0m [93mmolecular[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. This [93mreview[0m [93mhighlights[0m the [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillator[0m ([93mQDO[0m) [92mmodel[0m, a [93mphysically[0m [93mmotivated[0m and [93mcomputationally[0m [93mefficient[0m [92mframework[0m that [93mcaptures[0m the [93messential[0m [93mfeatures[0m of [93melectronic[0m [93mresponse[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93mforces[0m, [93macross[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mchemical[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdiscuss[0m how the [93mQDO[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mquantitatively[0m [93mreproduces[0m the [93mpolarization[0m [93mresponse[0m of [93mmany[0m-[93melectron[0m [93matoms[0m and how [93mkey[0m [93mcomponents[0m of [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m-[93mexchange[0m-[93mrepulsion[0m, [93mpolarization[0m, and [93mdispersion[0m-[93memerge[0m [93mnaturally[0m in [93mQDO[0m [93mdimers[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [92mmodel[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mpredictive[0m [93mscaling[0m [93mlaws[0m that [93melucidate[0m [93mtrends[0m in [93mpolarizability[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93macross[0m the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m and in [93mmolecular[0m [93massemblies[0m. - [93mEpidemiology[0m of [93manti[0m-[93mneutrophil[0m [93mcytoplasmic[0m [93mantibody[0m-[93massociated[0m [93mvasculitis[0m in [93mLithuania[0m, [93m2012[0m-[93m2021[0m: a [93mretrospective[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m.: [93mObjectives[0m: The [93maim[0m of this [93mstudy[0m was to [93massess[0m the [93mincidence[0m, [93mprevalence[0m and [93mmortality[0m of [93manti[0m-[93mneutrophil[0m [93mcytoplasmic[0m [93mantibody[0m ([93mANCA[0m)-[93massociated[0m [93mvasculitis[0m ([93mAAV[0m) in [93mLithuania[0m. [92mDesign[0m: [93mRetrospective[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m. [93mSetting[0m: [93mLithuanian[0m [93mNational[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mInsurance[0m [93mFund[0m and [93mCauses[0m of [93mDeath[0m [93mregistries[0m, [93mcovering[0m [93m1[0m [93mJanuary[0m [93m2012[0m through [93m31[0m [93mDecember[0m [93m2021[0m. [93mParticipants[0m: [93mPatients[0m were [93midentified[0m from [93mnational[0m [93mhealthcare[0m [93mregistries[0m in [93mLithuania[0m. The [93mfollowing[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mcriteria[0m were [93mapplied[0m: [93m1[0m) [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93meosinophilic[0m [93mgranulomatosis[0m with [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mEGPA[0m), [93mgranulomatosis[0m with [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mGPA[0m) or [93mmicroscopic[0m [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mMPA[0m) ([95mdiagnosis[0m [93mcodes[0m [93mM30[0m.[93m1[0m, [93mM31[0m.[93m3[0m and [93mM31[0m.[93m7[0m, [93maccording[0m to [93mInternational[0m [93mClassification[0m of [93mDiseases[0m [93m10[0m [93mth[0m [93mversion[0m ([93mICD[0m-[93m10[0m)) [93mrecorded[0m between [93m1[0m [93mJanuary[0m [93m2012[0m and [93m31[0m [93mDecember[0m [93m2021[0m; [93m2[0m) [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93mAAV[0m was [93mrecorded[0m in the [93mdatabase[0m at [93mleast[0m [93mtwice[0m with at [93mleast[0m [93m1[0m-[93mmonth[0m [93mperiod[0m between the [93mtwo[0m [93mtimepoints[0m; [93m3[0m) a [93mrecord[0m of at [93mleast[0m [93monce[0m [93mprescribed[0m [93mreimbursed[0m [93mmedication[0m-[93mglucocorticoids[0m ([93mprednisolone[0m or [93mmethylprednisolone[0m), [93mconventional[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mdisease[0m-[93mmodifying[0m [93manti[0m-[93mrheumatic[0m [93mdrugs[0m ([93mmethotrexate[0m, [93mazathioprine[0m, [93mhydroxychloroquine[0m and [93mcyclophosphamide[0m) or [93mbiological[0m [93mdisease[0m-[93mmodifying[0m [93manti[0m-[93mrheumatic[0m [93mdrug[0m ([93mrituximab[0m or [93mavailable[0m [93mbiosimilars[0m); and [93m4[0m) [93mage[0m >[93m18[0m [93myears[0m at the [93mtime[0m of [95mdiagnosis[0m. [93mOutcome[0m [93mmeasures[0m: [93mData[0m for the [93manalysis[0m [93mincluded[0m [93msex[0m, [93mage[0m, [93mICD[0m-[93m10[0m [93mcode[0m of [93mAAV[0m, the [93mfirst[0m [93mdate[0m of [93mAAV[0m [95mdiagnosis[0m and [93mdate[0m of [93mdeath[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m was [93msubdivided[0m into [93mperiods[0m [93m1[0m ([93m2013[0m-[93m2015[0m), [93m2[0m ([93m2016[0m-[93m2018[0m) and [93m3[0m ([93m2019[0m-[93m2021[0m). [93mTemporal[0m [93mtrends[0m of the [93mincidence[0m of [93mAAV[0m were [93massessed[0m. [93mPoint[0m [93mprevalence[0m [93mdata[0m were [93mrecorded[0m. [93mSex[0m- and [93mage[0m-[93mstandardised[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mratios[0m ([93mSMRs[0m) were [93mcalculated[0m. The [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m of [93mpatients[0m with [93mAAV[0m was [93mestimated[0m by [93mstandard[0m [93msingle[0m-[93mdecrement[0m [93mlife[0m-[93mtable[0m [93manalysis[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mWe[0m [93midentified[0m [93m236[0m [93mpatients[0m with [93mAAV[0m ([93mfemale[0m, [93m58[0m%) with an [93mannual[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93m8[0m.[93m22[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93madult[0m [93minhabitants[0m ([93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m, [93m9[0m.[93m83[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m2[0m, [93m6[0m.[93m88[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m, [93m7[0m.[93m95[0m). [93mIncreasing[0m [93mincidence[0m was [93mnoted[0m for [93mMPA[0m ([93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m, [93m0[0m.[93m9[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m, [93m2[0m.[93m49[0m). The [93mincidence[0m of [93mGPA[0m ([93m4[0m.[93m89[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93minhabitants[0m [93mper[0m [93myear[0m) was [93mthree[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than the [93mtotal[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93mEGPA[0m and [93mMPA[0m. The [93mprevalence[0m of [93mAAV[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93madult[0m [93mpopulation[0m [93mincreased[0m from [93m35[0m.[93m92[0m in [93m2015[0m to [93m69[0m.[93m14[0m in [93m2021[0m. [93m40[0m [93mdeaths[0m were [93mrecorded[0m during the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m, with a [93mmean[0m [93mage[0m at [93mdeath[0m of [93m65[0m.[93m2[0m (±[93m13[0m.[93m03[0m). [93mAAV[0m was [93massociated[0m with [93mreduced[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m [93mcompared[0m with the [93mgeneral[0m [93mpopulation[0m, [93mespecially[0m when [95mdiagnosed[0m at a [93myoung[0m [93mage[0m. The [93mSMRs[0m for the [93mtotal[0m [93mAAV[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mrevealed[0m a [93mdecreasing[0m [93mtrend[0m: [93m1[0m.[93m79[0m in [93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m67[0m in [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: [93mAAV[0m is [93massociated[0m with [93mincreased[0m [93mmortality[0m. During the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m, the [93mincidence[0m of [93mAAV[0m was [93mfound[0m to be [93mstable[0m, and the [93mprevalence[0m [93mhas[0m [93mincreased[0m.
- A [93mDigital[0m [93mPeriodic[0m [93mTable[0m That [93mInstructors[0m [93mCan[0m [93mUse[0m in the [93mClassroom[0m To [93mHighlight[0m [93mElements[0m and [93mIllustrate[0m [93mPeriodic[0m [93mTrends[0m
